headline: Is HPE the Next Big AI Stock? Goldman Sachs Weighs In
summary: Hewlett-Packard Enterprise Company (NYSE:HPE) is one of the AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On July 23, Goldman Sachs analyst Michael Ng reinstated coverage on the stock with a “Neutral” rating and a price target of $22. The rating follows HPE’s acquisition of Juniper Networks. According to the firm, HPE’s expanded portfolio has allowed it […]
